summary.span: Generates views for the extents in the , and creates a source code file for a type that will cache these views.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

summary.span: Generates views at compile time for the extents in a , and creates a source code file that makes these views available at run time.

span.span: Generates views at compile time for the extents in a , and creates a source code file that makes these views available at run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 既定では、実行時にエクステントでクエリまたは更新が実行される場合に、ビューが生成されます。By default, views are generated at run time whenever a query or update is performed on an extent. コンパイル時にビューを生成すると、実行時のビューの生成による負担が排除されるので、アプリケーションのパフォーマンスが向上します。Generating views at compile time can improve application performance by eliminating the expense of generating views at run time.
